summary: The Shouts are shown in Dragon Language. Useful if you\'re using you own voice for shouts, otherwise just a simple mod. All shouts changed (including Dawnguard and Dragonborn).
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=100][b][u]Dragon Language Shouts[/u][/b][/size][/center]

[i][color=red]Now Dragonborn shouts too.[/color][/i]

[u]Description[/u]:
This mod is just a plugin that simply changes the dragon words in the spells menu to the Dragon Language.
Very useful when you\'re using voice control for shouts while playing skyrim.

All shouts changed.
All Four Dragonborn Shouts changed.
   *Battle Fury
   *Bend Will
   *Cyclone
   *Dragon Aspect
All three Dawnguard Shouts changed.
   *Drain Vitality
   *Soul Tear
   *Summon Durnehviir

[i]Note : Originally Bethesda has added four shouts with Dawnguard DLC, but only three are player accessible so i\'ve changed only three player accessible shouts[/i].

This mod is quiet similar to the ThuuMic mod\'s file DragonWordsDisplay.esp but this mods also provide Dawnguard shouts, and this is my sole work.

Here is one mod which i use for skyrim for shouts
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28448]The Way of the Voice -- Real life dragon Shouts[/url].

I also used ThuuMic, a great mod but now it\'s dead, no support for dawnguard shouts and a little buggy, but if you want it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5626]click here[/url].

Since there is no more announcement for anymore DLC of Skyrim, this mod won\'t be updated anymore.

[b]Check downloads tab and select the file useful to you.[/b]

[u]Install[/u]:
Simply use NMM to intall.
Or Extract and copy DragonLanuageShouts.esp file into games data folder.

[u]Uninstall[/u]:
Uninstall using NMM.
Or Just delete DragonLanuageShouts.esp from Data folder.

Let me know how this mod turns out for you.

[size=20][b][u]Thank you for using my mod[/u][/b][/size].


[u]Credits[/u]:
Shouting in mic drove me to create this mod so originally DeadlyAzuril. 
jeanlou - for for WOTV, and Dawnguard shouts.
And Bethesda for creating such an awesome game.
author: Aadil Valconi

files.name: Dragon Lanuage Shouts
files.changelogHtml: New file because previous file wasn't working. This should work fine.
